Name: Pierce Boggan
Bio: Pierce is in charge of the Xamarin Student Embassador Program. He currently manages and directs the group. He has great ideas, and really pushes the group as a whole to be the best they can be.

Name: Tyler Vanderhoef
Bio: Tyler goes to school at Washington State University Vancouver and is studying Computer Science. He specializes in Xamarin.Forms and Xaml. He is awesome because he also speaks Italian.
